alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Frederick (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 10 at 2:38AM EST until January 10 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Maryland, Washington and Frederick MD Counties. In Virginia, Frederick VA and Clarke Counties. In West Virginia, Morgan, Berkeley and Jefferson Counties. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 5 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
